// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float2 DistanceFadeParameters;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_2;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_3;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float4 UniformPixelScalars_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;
//   bool bEnableDistanceShadowFading;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   bEnableDistanceShadowFading  b1       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   ViewProjectionMatrix         c8       4
//   UniformPixelScalars_0        c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   DistanceFadeParameters       c14      1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2             s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_3             s4       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 2, -1, -2, -0
    def c3, 0.200000003, -9.99999997e-007, 0.800000012, 15
    dcl_color v0.w
    dcl_texcoord v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v4
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

    dp3 r0.x, v3, v3
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.yzw, r0.x, v3.xxyz
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v2
    texld r2, v1, s1
    mov_sat r1.w, v0.w
    mad r2.xyz, r2, c2.x, c2.yyzw
    mad_pp r2.xyz, r1.w, r2, -c2.wwyw
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, r2
    dp3 r2.x, r3, r0.yzww
    mul r2.xyz, r2.x, r3
    mad r2.xyz, r2, c2.x, -r0.yzww
    if b0
      mul r4.xyz, c9.xyww, v4.y
      mad r4.xyz, c8.xyww, v4.x, r4
      mad r4.xyz, c10.xyww, v4.z, r4
      mad r4.xyz, c11.xyww, v4.w, r4

// Unreal Engine halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-ps-halo --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --only-autofixed CRC32_873F2AE4_0.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r4.z, -r31.y
mad r4.x, r31.w, r31.x, r4.x

      rcp r0.y, r4.z
      mul r0.yz, r0.y, r4.xxyw
      mad r0.yz, r0, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r4, r0.yzzw, s0
      mul_pp r4.xyz, r4, r4
      if b1
        dp3 r0.y, v4, v4
        rsq r0.y, r0.y
        rcp r0.y, r0.y
        add r0.y, -r0.y, c14.x
        mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.y, c14.y
        mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
        mad_pp r0.z, r4.w, r4.w, c2.y
        mad_pp r5.xyz, r0.y, r0.z, -c2.y
      else
        mov_pp r5.xyz, -c2.y
      endif
      mul_pp r4.xyz, r4, r5
    else
      mov_pp r4.xyz, -c2.y
    endif
    mov_pp r0.y, c2.y
    add r5.xyz, -r0.y, -c0
    mul r0.yz, c12.x, v1.xxyw
    texld r6, r0.yzzw, s2
    texld r7, r2, s3
    mad r7.xyz, r6, c3.x, r7
    mad r0.x, v3.z, -r0.x, -c2.y
    cmp r0.x, r0.w, r0_abs.x, -c2.y
    add r0.w, r0.x, c3.y
    mul r2.w, r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r2.w
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c3.z, c3.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.w, r0.x, c3.x
    lrp r8.xyz, r0.x, r7, r6
    texld r0, r0.yzzw, s4
    lrp r6.xyz, r1.w, r0, r8
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r5, r6
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c4.w, c4
    dp3_sat_pp r0.w, r3, r1
    add r1.w, r0.w, c3.y
    cmp_pp r0.w, r1.w, r0.w, -c2.w
    dp3_sat_pp r1.x, r2, r1
    add r1.y, r1.x, c3.y
    pow_pp r2.x, r1.x, c3.w
    mul_pp r1.xzw, r2.x, c5.xyyz
    cmp_pp r1.xyz, r1.y, r1.xzww, -c2.w
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0.w, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r4, r0
    mul oC0.xyz, r0, c13
    mov oC0.w, -c2.w

// approximately 78 instruction slots used (5 texture, 73 arithmetic)
